description: REDEVELOPMENT OF SITE TO PROVIDE NEW PART 5, PART 6, PART 7 AND PART 8 STOREY BUILDING (MAXIMUM HEIGHT 25.7M) COMPRISING COMMERCIAL FLOORSPACE (CLASS B1) AT GROUND FLOOR AND 95 RESIDENTIAL UNITS (USE CLASS C3) ABOVE; ASSOCIATED CAR PARKING AND CYCLE PARKING, LANDSCAPING AND PODIUM GARDEN AT FIRST FLOOR LEVEL.
